title: D&D To-Do List
description: A modern, responsive task management web app built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, dynamic board and column creation, task modals with detailed descriptions and due dates, and user-friendly interactions. Designed with a colorful, theme-based interface and optimized for both desktop and mobile. Implements client-side state management, modals, and interactive UI components to provide a production-ready, visually engaging experience.
